title: Bug 6536 - Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
description: When trying to add Javadoc on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu does not have any effect. The expected behavior is that the action should add Javadoc to the selected field. It is suggested to either remove this option from the menu or fix it to add the Javadoc as expected.
OB: When selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu after right-clicking on a field in the Type Hierarchy view, nothing happens.
EB: The expected behavior is that selecting the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu after right-clicking on a field in the Type Hierarchy view should add Javadoc to the selected field.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the Type Hierarchy view.
2. Right-click on a field in the Type Hierarchy view.
3. Select the 'Add Javadoc' option from the context menu and observe that nothing happens.
